highlights: Led frontend architecture and crafted custom UX solutions to enhance user engagement and streamline workflows
Built interactive dashboards with geospatial insights to transform complex public safety data into actionable visuals
Developed secure, scalable cloud infrastructure to ensure reliable performance and protect sensitive research data
Built a new onboarding flow, improving self-enrolled users by 33%
Developed high business impact components, such as the Credit Line widget and a scalable Navbar
Pioneered the implementation of Typescript and Unit testing, improving overall application trust
Implemented features such as yearly subscriptions and multiple restaurants per user, increasing company revenue by 40%
Optimized Lighthouse metrics by 98, achieving a smoother user experience and significant SEO improvements
Responsible for maintaining and deploying the platform using Next.js, Redux, and Firebase as the primary technology stack
In charge of improving the company website and maintaining the design system
Optimized the app for maximum speed and scalability
Created features to enhance the user experience
